naslov: LUXURY VILLA near Omiš / intimacy of life / read the description (prodaja)
opis: - exclusive sale of the agency #adriaINgroup - the buyer pays an agency commission of 3% of the selling price Dear clients, a tour of the property is possible only with a signed brokerage agreement which is the basis for further actions related to the sale, all in accordance with the Real Estate Brokerage Act. Modern and luxurious villa located in unspoiled nature, in the small picturesque village, surrounded by hills, with a traditional restaurant within walking distance (800m), but still very close to pirates’ town Omiš (6km), river Cetina and the beautiful the Adriatic Sea. The ideal position of this property offers you many possibilities in 7 minutes of driving: you can visit the town of Omiš full of historical attractions and great restaurants; go to the sandy or pebble beaches, try rafting on river Cetina, zip line above the canyon of a mentioned river or you can visit famous, 1700 years old town Split, only 25km (30min driving) from the property. The ground floor of Villa offers a private 46sqm swimming pool and a spacious sun deck area with 10 lounge chairs and a seating lounge for 6-8 people.. Inside is a modern and fully equipped kitchen with comfortable dining and living area with A/C and exit to the pool area, a separate Toilette, Bedroom No1.with a double bed 180x200cm + en-suite bathroom with shower, A/C. The first floor offers modern and comfortable 2 en-suite bedrooms, one separate bedroom, and a family bathroom as follows: Bedroom No.2 with two single beds (90x200), A/C. Bedroom No.3 with double bed (180x200), A/C, bathroom with bathtub, balcony with pool view. Bedroom No.4 with double bed (180x200), A/C, bathroom with shower, balcony with pool view. Family bathroom with shower. At the lower ground, you have a sauna, toilette, a classic Croatian tavern with A/C where you have local wine that you can taste and buy. Also, at your disposal are a fitness room (orbitrek, pilates ball, 2 exercise sponges, small weights, and Home Gym) and billiards with A/C. Outside is an outdoor covered dining area with a kitchenette, a traditional barbecue, a playground for children, and a sitting lounge in the garden. In front of the Villa, you have secured a parking place for 3 cars. Villa offers all you would need for a very comfortable and luxurious vacation! The first neighbors are 100m away, so you have absolute privacy. // NOTE: MORE PICTURES AND DETAILS ON REQUEST #adriaINgroup realestate-consulting-design-development-VIP service ...............................................................
